post.title: Gearing up for the civil war this fall be like

body: Food will probably be more important for most people than guns. Yeah, you want guns to defend your stockpile, but you probably won't see action unless you're looking for it. Also, don't tell your neighbors that you're stockpiling food and gas unless you know for a fact that they are too.
body_html: Food will probably be more important for most people than guns. Yeah, you want guns to defend your stockpile, but you probably won't see action unless you're looking for it. Also, don't tell your neighbors that you're stockpiling food and gas unless you know for a fact that they are too.

post.title: Gearing up for the civil war this fall be like

body:
Being completely honest the only “civil war” that could happen is Antifa and the Proud Boys going at it in the streets while the non-extremist (aka normal) part of the population watches from the comfort of home. The collective IQ of the country will actually go up if this happens, but that would be the only good thing to come out of this scenario.

Stay safe and stay out of any major cities until at least November 4th and probably until 2021.
body_html:
Being completely honest the only “civil war” that could happen is Antifa and the Proud Boys going at it in the streets while the non-extremist (aka normal) part of the population watches from the comfort of home. Stay safe and stay out of any major cities until at least November 4th and probably until 2021.
